tiles.title: Express Wills
tiles.description: Capture and articulate what we want the world to become

details.what: A system for transforming vague desires into clear, actionable intentions
details.how: Visual hexagonal mapping that makes implicit goals explicit
details.why: Because change starts with clearly expressing what we want

tiles.title: Legitimize Through Sharing
tiles.description: Defend and validate our wills by making them public and discussable

details.what: A platform for sharing systems openly for scrutiny and validation
details.how: Public system galleries with discussion and critique features
details.why: Because legitimacy comes from transparency and defendability

tiles.title: Test with AI First
tiles.description: Use AI as a sandbox for practicing deliberate system design

details.what: AI systems as a training ground for deliberation skills
details.how: Build AI workflows that embody clear intentions and logic
details.why: Because AI interaction teaches us to be explicit about goals

tiles.title: Enable Democratic Deliberation
tiles.description: Scale individual deliberation to collective decision-making

details.what: Tools for group deliberation and shared governance
details.how: Collaborative hexagonal maps for collective decision processes
details.why: Because deliberation must scale from personal to societal

tiles.title: Make Intentions Visible
tiles.description: Reveal the what, how, and why behind every system

details.what: Transparency layer showing system logic and tradeoffs
details.how: Automatic documentation of priorities and decision paths
details.why: Because understanding requires seeing the full picture

tiles.title: Enrich Through Discussion
tiles.description: Improve and evolve wills through collective input

details.what: Collaborative refinement of systems through discourse
details.how: Comment threads, forks, and merge proposals for systems
details.why: Because wills grow stronger through constructive critique

neighbors.connection: Expression naturally leads to sharing for validation
Shared systems can be tested and refined with AI

center.title: Deliberate World
center.description: Making the world more the result of what we want rather than circumstances
center.unifying_principle: Transform implicit desires into explicit, shared, and actionable systems
